weakness.name: Undetected changes in data encryption configuration
weakness.desc: The changes on the database encryption must be audited and monitored. When there are changes on the database encryption, the security group must be alerted.

test.steps:
1. Go to "Monitor" and then to "Alerts".
  2. Check that there is any rule to alert when the Transparent Data Encryption is disabled.
  3. Check if these rules are enabled.
